ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Ok..new bard here.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think so. I think the songs last longer after ending them once you get higher. My lvl 11 has her songs continue for about 3 seconds after she stops
ygData.messageBody:
> Wow...thank you! That will be quite helpful. I've already got 2 songs
> that I hang between till the one fades (being only 3rd level, and the 2nd
> level one ends when you quit singing it.)
> Do the effects of your songs last longer when you quit singing them as you
> go up in level?
>
I think so. I think the songs last longer after ending them once you get
higher. My lvl 11 has her songs continue for about 3 seconds after she stops
singing them.
>
> A question on the 3rd level song, the Jig. It says I feel this energy go
> thru my body, I was wondering what the effects of the song are?
>
It effects the yellow meter. If you want to getup your swimming skill and
not get fagigued, play that song while you swim. So if you run out of food
or drink and your stamina is going down, play that song. It does about the
same thing as the cleric song "Extinguish fatigue" only it is constant.
>
> Oh, and don't play the AoE song in a mob filled area. Ouch.
>
And certainly don't play it near guards or npcs you don't want to fight.
luv,
-Su
